room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: We loved the Sherlock Holmes room! Thanks for the fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: Super fun! Our game master Amy was highly engaging, and the Sherlock room was very well done. I loved the various mechanisms used to solve clues. Great time for friends or team building with coworkers. Will definitely go again. Thanks for having us!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: My husband and I joined a group to do the Sherlock Holmes room. It was a blast and an experience that we won't forget.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: Worked through the Sherlock room with co-workers and had a great time. Amy was awesome and a huge help! Can't wait to come back with family to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: The experience was so awesome. The team members who set us up on the Sherlock Holmes mission were great. They showed a true genuine passion for working there and were very friendly. We ended up getting out with 10 minutes left and only using one clue. Truly a team effort and amazing bonding experience with our team! Thanks for creating a lasting memory I can celebrate with colleagues.
